amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds for the Missouri River Authorized Purposes Study (MRAPS).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds for the study of the Missouri River Projects authorized in section 108 of the Energy and Water Development and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2009 (division C of Public Law 111-8).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Luetkemeyer amendment (A061) Agreed to by voice vote.
